47.ara-name: كتاب تفسير القرآن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Samurah bin Jundab:that the Prophet (ﷺ) said: "When Hawwa became pregnant, Iblis came to her - and her children would not live (after birth) - so he said: 'Name him 'Abdul-Harith.' So she named him 'Abdul-Harith and he lived. So that is among the inspirations of Ash-Shaitan and his commands
